expo.name: Lumbus - eSIM Data Plans
expo.description: Get instant eSIM data plans for travel. Stay connected worldwide with affordable mobile data. No physical SIM card needed - activate eSIM in minutes.

apple.name: Lumbus - eSIM Data Plans
apple.subtitle: Travel eSIM & Mobile Data
apple.description:
Stay connected anywhere in the world with Lumbus eSIM. Get instant access to affordable mobile data plans in 190+ countries without changing your physical SIM card.

WHY CHOOSE LUMBUS?
‚Ä¢ Instant Activation - Get connected in minutes
‚Ä¢ Global Coverage - 190+ countries and regions
‚Ä¢ Affordable Plans - Competitive pricing for travelers
‚Ä¢ No Physical SIM - 100% digital eSIM technology
‚Ä¢ Easy Management - Track your data usage in real-time
‚Ä¢ Multiple Plans - Keep multiple eSIMs for different regions
‚Ä¢ Secure Payment - Pay safely with Stripe integration
‚Ä¢ 24/7 Support - Help when you need it

HOW IT WORKS:
1. Browse data plans for your destination
2. Purchase and receive your eSIM instantly
3. Scan the QR code to install
4. Activate and start using mobile data

PERFECT FOR:
‚Ä¢ International travelers
‚Ä¢ Digital nomads
‚Ä¢ Business travelers
‚Ä¢ Remote workers
‚Ä¢ Anyone who needs reliable mobile data abroad

FEATURES:
‚Ä¢ Real-time data usage tracking
‚Ä¢ Push notifications for usage alerts
‚Ä¢ Easy top-up options
‚Ä¢ Multiple eSIM management
‚Ä¢ QR code installation
‚Ä¢ Detailed plan information
‚Ä¢ Transaction history
‚Ä¢ User-friendly interface

NO MORE:
‚Ä¢ Expensive roaming charges
‚Ä¢ Hunting for local SIM cards
‚Ä¢ Language barriers at mobile shops
‚Ä¢ Airport queues
‚Ä¢ Physical SIM card swapping

IMPORTANT:
‚Ä¢ Requires eSIM-compatible device
‚Ä¢ Check device compatibility before purchase
‚Ä¢ Active internet connection needed for initial setup

Download Lumbus today and travel with confidence knowing you'll always stay connected!
